Gold.en: An attack that may up user's ATTACK.

Silver.en: An attack that may up user's ATTACK.

Crystal.en: An attack that may up user's ATTACK.

Ruby.en: A claw attack that may raise the user’s ATTACK.
Ruby.de: Klauen Attacke. Evtl. Erhöhung d. ANGR.-Wert. d. Anw.

Sapphire.en: A claw attack that may raise the user’s ATTACK.
Sapphire.de: Klauen Attacke. Evtl. Erhöhung d. ANGR.-Wert. d. Anw.

Emerald.en: A claw attack that may raise the user’s ATTACK.
Emerald.de: Klauen Attacke. Evtl. Erhöhung d. ANGR.-Wert. d. Anw.

FireRed.en: The foe is attacked with steel claws. It may also raise the user’s ATTACK.
FireRed.de: Klauen-Attacke, die evtl. den ANGR.-Wert des Anwenders erhöht.
